channel.title: Music – Cheap Trick
channel.description: Recent content in Cheap Trick on Music

item.title: Cheap Trick - The Flame
item.description:
작사: MITCHELL BOB, GRAHAM NICK
KY: 60656 / KY: 22846

Another night
slowly closes in
And I feel
so lonely
Touchin’ me freezin’
on my skin
I pretend you
still own me
I’m going crazy
I’m losin’ sleep
I’m in too far I’m in
way too deep over you
I can’t believe
you’re gone
You were the first
you’ll be the last
Wherever you go
I’ll be with you
Whatever you want
I’ll give it to you
Whenever you
need someone
To lay your heart
and head upon
Remember after
the fire
After all the rain
I will be the flame
I will be
the flame

Watchin’ shadows
movin’ cross the wall
Feels so
frightenin’
I wanna run to you
I wanna call
But I’ve been
hit by lightnin’
Just can’t stand up
for fallin’ apart
Can’t see through
this spell
I cross my heart
over you
You’ll always
be the one
You were the first
you’ll be the last
Wherever you go
I’ll be with you
Whatever you want
I’ll give it to you
Whenever you
need someone
To lay your heart
and head upon
Remember after
the fire
After all the rain
I will be the flame
I will be
the flame

I’m going crazy
I’m losin’ sleep
I’m in too far I’m in
way too deep over you
You’ll always
be the one
You were the first
you’ll be the last
Wherever you go
I’ll be with you
Whatever you want
I’ll give it to you
Whenever you
need someone
To lay your heart
and head upon
Remember after
the fire
After all the rain
I will be the flame
I will be
the flame

Whatever you want
I’ll give it to you
Wherever you go
I’ll be with you
